definition: to surpass/to stand above the crowd
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
Chen Duxiu (1879-1942), co-founder of the Chinese Communist Party in 1921

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 独秀峰位于桂林王城内，是王城景区不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu was still for moderation and concessions to the Wuhan Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 陈独秀却依然主张对武汉国民党的妥协退让。

sentences.english: Hongkong Winling has dominated Hongkong basketball league for many years.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，永伦队在香港篮球联赛中一直是一枝独秀。

sentences.english: The first proposing Chen Duxiu goes to Moscow was Far East Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 共产国际代表主张陈独秀赴莫斯科目的是惩罚他。

sentences.english: This article tries to give a brief discussion on Chen's achievements and mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 本文试对陈独秀的功过是非略陈管见。

sentences.english: Bianliang Imperial College is a special branch in the central engraving institutions of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 在宋代中央刻书机构中，汴梁国子监可谓是一枝独秀。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu Corrected the left-wing three times during the period of the Great revolution which is reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 大革命时期陈独秀的三次纠“左”皆是无可厚非的。

sentences.english: Apple lords over the high-end market.
sentences.chinese: 苹果目前在高端笔记本电脑市场一枝独秀。

sentences.english: The first part is about the formation of the background and conditions of Chen Duxiu's idea of newspaper and periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 五四前后陈独秀报刊编辑思想形成的背景和条件。

sentences.english: Four Seasons care outshines all else in Alexandria.
sentences.chinese: 四季保健一枝独秀一切在亚历山德里亚。

sentences.english: The first part is about the formation of Chen Duxiu's democratic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章是陈独秀的资产阶级民主思想。

sentences.english: Chen Duxiu was a pioneer in moral revolution in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 陈独秀是近代革命的先驱。

sentences.english: A nurse is plum tree in winter, sending fragrance in complete silence.
sentences.chinese: 护士，是冬日的红梅，暗香独秀，默默无闻。

sentences.english: This mountain belongs to Lao Long Gang Mountain Chain. It stands alone gracefully and steadily.
sentences.chinese: 猫耳山属老龙岗山脉，孤立独秀，蔚然挺拔。

sentences.english: A period of time before the Revolution of 1911 witnessed the participation of Chen Duxiu in the rebellious parties.
sentences.chinese: 陈独秀在辛亥革命前曾有过一段投身“乱党”的日子。

sentences.english: Chen Du - xiu had been pursuing socialism before he degraded himself into a Trotskyite .
sentences.chinese: 社会主义是陈独秀蜕变为托派以前矢志不渝的追求。

definition: beauty contest/vying to be the most beautiful
lit. only one branch of the tree is thriving (idiom)/fig. to be in a league of one's own/outstanding
vying to be the most glamorous/each more gorgeous than the other/beauty contest
pine and cypress/fig. chaste and undefiled/fig. tomb
to rise steeply from level ground
